oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Guide plan of Cairo and district.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Egypt. Maṣlaḥat al-Misāḥah
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: 1 map : col. ; 46 x 62 cm., on sheet 52 x 76 cm.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Includes index to principal buildings and places of interest. Insets: Gîza Pyramids. Scale 1:25,000 -- Ḥelwân. Scale 1:25,000 -- Central Cairo. Scale 1:12,000.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Cairo; Egypt; Giza; Egypt; Heliopolis; Egypt
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cairo (Egypt) -- Maps
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; the American University in Cairo
